Simyeong

BVNDIT

Introduction

Lee Simyeong (이시명) was the Lead Dancer, Sub Vocalist, and Visual of the Girl Group BVNDIT (Be Ambitious N Do It) under MNH Entertainment. Living by her motto "Live Flexibly", Simyeong does whatever it takes to express gratitude towards the people around her. She aims to be stronger and better for her group so that they could even reach #1 in a music show someday.
